trans-unit.source: Provides properties and methods for constructing an e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder egenskaper og metoder for å opprette en e-postmelding.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailMessage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailMessage"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the collection of attachments that are transmitted with the message.
trans-unit.target: Angir samlingen av vedlegg som er sendt med meldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: New attachments can be added to the mail message by a call to `Message.Attachments.Add(MyMailMessage)`.
trans-unit.target: Ny vedlegg kan legges til e-postmelding av et kall til `Message.Attachments.Add(MyMailMessage)`.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.Send%2A> for an example of <xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail> usage.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.Send%2A>et eksempel på <xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail>Bruk.</xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail> </xref:System.Web.Mail.SmtpMail.Send%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IList> collection of <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailAttachment"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IList>samling <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailAttachment"> </xref> objekter.</xref:System.Collections.IList>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of email addresses that receive a blind carbon copy (BCC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en semikolondelt liste over e-postadresser mottar en Blindkopi (Blindkopi) i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Recipients in the semicolon-delimited list can be either email addresses or address book display names.
trans-unit.target: Mottakere i semikolondelt liste kan være enten e-postadressene eller adresse book visningsnavn.

trans-unit.source: The primary and carbon copy (<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Cc%2A>) recipients do not see the addresses in the `Bcc` field.
trans-unit.target: Den primære og kopi (<xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Cc%2A>) mottakere ser ikke adressene i den `Bcc` felt.</xref:System.Web.Mail.MailMessage.Cc%2A>

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a blind carbon copy (BCC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: En semikolondelt liste over e-postadresser mottar en Blindkopi (Blindkopi) i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir meldingsteksten i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Meldingsteksten i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the encoding type of the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir Kodingstypen av meldingsteksten i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref:System.Text.Encoding> values that indicates the encoding type of the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref:System.Text.Encoding>verdier som angir Kodingstypen av meldingsteksten i e-postmeldingen.</xref:System.Text.Encoding>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the content type of the body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir innholdstypen for meldingsteksten i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailFormat"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailFormat"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a carbon copy (CC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en semikolondelt liste over e-postadresser mottar en kopi (CC) i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Recipients in the semicolon-delimited list can be either email addresses or address book display names.
trans-unit.target: Mottakere i semikolondelt liste kan være enten e-postadressene eller adresse book visningsnavn.

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses that receive a carbon copy (CC) of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: En semikolondelt liste over e-postadresser mottar en kopi (CC) i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of objects that map to Microsoft Collaboration Data Objects (CDO) fields.
trans-unit.target: Henter en samling objekter som er tilordnet Microsoft samarbeid CDO (Data Objects) felt.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Fields property is used to set extended properties for Collaboration Data Objects (CDO).
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen feltene brukes til å angi utvidede egenskaper for samarbeid CDO Data Objects ().

trans-unit.source: For more information about CDO, see "Collaboration Data Objects" and "Configuration CoClass" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om CDO, kan du se "samarbeidsdataobjekter" og "Konfigurasjonen delklasse" i MSDN-biblioteket på http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of objects that map to Collaboration Data Objects (CDO) fields.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>samling objekter som er tilordnet samarbeid CDO (Data Objects) felt.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the e-mail address of the sender.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir e-postadresse for avsender.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The sender's e-mail address.
trans-unit.target: Avsenderens e-postadresse.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the custom headers that are transmitted with the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Angir egendefinerte attributter som er sendt med e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of custom headers.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>samling av egendefinerte overskrifter.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the priority of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir prioriteten for e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailPriority"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.Mail.MailPriority"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the subject line of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir emnelinjen i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The subject line of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Emnelinjen i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a semicolon-delimited list of recipient e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en semikolondelt liste over e-postadresser.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Recipients in the semicolon-delimited list can be either email addresses or address book display names.
trans-unit.target: Mottakere i semikolondelt liste kan være enten e-postadressene eller adresse book visningsnavn.

trans-unit.source: A semicolon-delimited list of e-mail addresses.
trans-unit.target: En semikolondelt liste over e-postadresser.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Base" name="Content-Base" href=""></xref> HTTP header, the URL base of all relative URLs used within the HTML-encoded body of the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Base" name="Content-Base" href=""> </xref> HTTP-hode, grunntallet URL-adressen for alle URL-adresser brukes i HTML-kodet meldingsteksten i e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The URL base.
trans-unit.target: Grunntallet URL-adresse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Location" name="Content-Location" href=""></xref> HTTP header for the e-mail message.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den <xref uid="langword_csharp_Content-Location" name="Content-Location" href=""> </xref> HTTP-hode for e-postmeldingen.

trans-unit.source: Recommended alternative: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Anbefalt alternativ: <xref href="System.Net.Mail"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_content-base" name="content-base" href=""></xref> header.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref uid="langword_csharp_content-base" name="content-base" href=""> </xref> hodet.
